# update(_:with:eventHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Updates a model with a sequence of features.

## Declaration

```swift
func update(_ model: inout LinearTimeSeriesForecaster<Scalar>.Model, with input: some Sequence<AnnotatedFeature<MLShapedArray<Scalar>, MLShapedArray<Scalar>>>, eventHandler: EventHandler? = nil) async throws
```

## Parameters

- **model**: The model to update.
- **input**: A sequence of annotated features. The feature shape must be `[featureSize]` and the annotation shape must be `[annotationSize]`.
- **eventHandler**: An event handler.

## Discussion

This method uses a sliding window to chunk the input features into features of [doc://com.apple.createmlcomponents/documentation/CreateMLComponents/LinearTimeSeriesForecaster/inputWindowSize] elements and annotations of [doc://com.apple.createmlcomponents/documentation/CreateMLComponents/LinearTimeSeriesForecaster/forecastWindowSize] elements. If you want to use a different windowing strategy, use [doc://com.apple.createmlcomponents/documentation/CreateMLComponents/LinearTimeSeriesForecaster/update(_:withWindows:eventHandler:)].
title: update(_:with:eventHandler:)
